meanings.definition: Strongest or most muscular in a group.
meanings.sent1: He was the burliest man in the gym, lifting weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The burliest wrestler easily pinned his opponents to the mat.
meanings.sent3: The burliest guy at the party challenged everyone to an arm-wrestling contest.
meanings.sent4: His burliest competitor in the weightlifting competition was no match for his strength.
meanings.sent5: The burliest bear in the forest stood tall and formidable, a true force of nature.

meanings.definition: Most robust or sturdy in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The burliest tree in the forest withstood the strongest winds.
meanings.sent2: Among the group of cars, the burliest SUV looked the most rugged.
meanings.sent3: The burliest pumpkin at the fair won first prize for its impressive size.
meanings.sent4: Her burliest suitcase could hold all her belongings without any trouble.
meanings.sent5: The burliest mountain in the range loomed majestically against the sky.

meanings.sent1: The burliest lion in the pride led the pack with confidence.
meanings.sent2: In the superhero team, he was known as the burliest member, able to lift heavy objects effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The burliest robot in the factory was programmed for heavy lifting tasks.
meanings.sent4: His burliest opponent in the boxing ring proved to be a formidable challenge.
meanings.sent5: The burliest storm of the season brought strong winds and heavy rain to the town.
